maze.datastructures

Class Sides

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.datastructures.Sides

  • public class Sides
extends Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getIndexOfNextRoom(int side, Room room)
      ´Side's value 0 returns the upper room's index, with value 1 returns the lower room's index, value 2 return the left room's index, value 3 returns the right room's index.
      static int getTypeOfSide(int side, Room room)
      ´Side's value 0 returns the upper room's type, with value 1 returns the lower room's typex, value 2 return the left room's type, value 3 returns the right room's type.
      static void setAsHallway(int side, Room current, Room next)
      Sets hallway between two rooms that are next to each other.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexOfNextRoom

        public static int getIndexOfNextRoom(int side,
                                     Room room)
        ´Side's value 0 returns the upper room's index, with value 1 returns the lower room's index, value 2 return the left room's index, value 3 returns the right room's index. Throws IllegalArgumentException if side is not 0, 1, 2 or 3
        Returns:
        index of the room that is on parameter rooms side that corresponds to the parameter side

      • getTypeOfSide

        public static int getTypeOfSide(int side,
                                Room room)
        ´Side's value 0 returns the upper room's type, with value 1 returns the lower room's typex, value 2 return the left room's type, value 3 returns the right room's type. Throws IllegalArgumentException if side is not 0, 1, 2 or 3
        Parameters:
        side - side corresponds to a side of the room, 0: upper, 1: 1ower, 2: left, 3: right
        room - room which sides type is returned in this method
        Returns:
        type of the side

      • setAsHallway

        public static void setAsHallway(int side,
                                Room current,
                                Room next)
        Sets hallway between two rooms that are next to each other. Parameter side is used to set the hallway on current rooms corresponding side and side is used on the next room to set the opposite of the corresponding side to hallway.
        Parameters:
        side - side corresponds to a side of the current room, 0: upper, 1: 1ower, 2: left, 3: right.
        current - current room
        next - room that is on the current rooms side that corresponds to parameter side
